name: Dagger of Venom
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Weapons/Specific Weapons/Dagger of Venom

Construction.Requirements: Craft Magic Arms and Armor, poison

sections.body: This black +1 dagger has a serrated edge. It allows the wielder to use a poison effect (as the spell, save DC 14) upon a creature struck by the blade once per day. The wielder can decide to use the power after he has struck. Doing so is a free action, but the poison effect must be invoked in the same round that the dagger strikes.
sections.name: DESCRIPTION
